- [93mPressure[0m-[93mInduced[0m [93mEnhanced[0m [93mCovalency[0m [93mDifference[0m in the [93mCoordination[0m of [93mAm[0m([93mIII[0m)/[93mEu[0m([93mIII[0m) with an [93mUnsymmetric[0m [93mPhenanthroline[0m [93mExtractant[0m.: The [93minfluence[0m of [93mhigh[0m [93mpressure[0m on the [93mcoordination[0m [93mproperties[0m of [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mcompounds[0m is a [93mtopic[0m of [93mgrowing[0m [93minterest[0m, which [93mprovides[0m [93mpotential[0m [93mapplications[0m in the [93mseparation[0m of [93mactinide[0m (An [93m3[0m+ ) and [93mlanthanide[0m ([93mLn[0m [93m3[0m+ ) [93mions[0m. In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mwe[0m [95mexplore[0m the [93meffect[0m of [93mhigh[0m [93mpressure[0m on the [93mbonding[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m of the [93munsymmetric[0m [93mphenanthroline[0m [93mextractant[0m ([93mEt[0m-[93mTol[0m-[93mCyMe4[0m-[93mATPhen[0m, [93mL[0m ) in its [93mcomplexes[0m with [93mAm[0m [93m3[0m+ and [93mEu[0m [93m3[0m+ [93musing[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m ([93mDFT[0m) and [93mvarious[0m [93mbonding[0m [93manalyses[0m. [93mPressures[0m [93mranging[0m from [93m0[0m to [93m10[0m [93mGPa[0m are [93mapplied[0m to [95minvestigate[0m [91mchanges[0m in the [93mgeometry[0m, [93melectronic[0m [93mstructure[0m, and [93mbond[0m [93mcovalency[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mresults[0m [93mshow[0m that [93mhigh[0m [93mpressure[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93menhances[0m the [93mcovalent[0m [93mcharacter[0m of the [93mbonds[0m between [93mL[0m and [93mAm[0m [93m3[0m+ /[93mEu[0m [93m3[0m+ , [93mevidenced[0m by [93mincreased[0m [93melectron[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mρ[0m([93mr[0m), [93mdelocalization[0m [93mindices[0m ([93mDI[0m), [93mstronger[0m [93mcovalent[0m [93morbital[0m [93minteractions[0m ([93mΔ[0m [93mE[0m [93morb[0m ), and [93minteratomic[0m [93mexchange[0m [93minteractions[0m ( [93mV[0m [93mxc[0m ). [93mNotably[0m, while the [93mEu[0m- [93mL[0m [93mbond[0m [93mlengths[0m [93mcontract[0m [93mmore[0m than the [93mAm[0m- [93mL[0m [93mbonds[0m, the [93m5f[0m [93morbitals[0m of [93mAm[0m [93m3[0m+ are [93mmore[0m [93msensitive[0m to [93mpressure[0m than the [93mrelatively[0m [93mcontracted[0m [93m4f[0m [93morbitals[0m of [93mEu[0m [93m3[0m+ , [93mresulting[0m in an [93menhanced[0m [93mcovalency[0m [93mdifference[0m [93mconfirmed[0m by [93mnatural[0m [93mlocalized[0m [93mmolecular[0m [93morbital[0m ([93mNLMO[0m) [93manalysis[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93mhighlight[0m the [93msignificant[0m [93mrole[0m of [93mhigh[0m [93mpressure[0m in [93maltering[0m the [93mbonding[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m of [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mcompounds[0m, [93mopening[0m [93mnew[0m [93mavenues[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93mstudies[0m of [93mhighly[0m [93mefficient[0m [93mAm[0m [93m3[0m+ /[93mEu[0m [93m3[0m+ [93mseparation[0m.
- A [93mseries[0m of [93mlanthanide[0m [93mglutarates[0m: [93mlanthanide[0m [93mcontraction[0m [93meffect[0m on [93mcrystal[0m [93mframeworks[0m of [93mlanthanide[0m [93mglutarates[0m: [93mAlthough[0m [93msome[0m [93m3[0m-[93mD[0m [93mlanthanide[0m [93mglutarates[0m [93mhave[0m been [93mreported[0m, [93mthey[0m [93mexhibit[0m a [93mvery[0m [93mrobust[0m [93mstructural[0m [93mtype[0m, whose [93mstructure[0m is not [91mchanged[0m by [93mdifferent[0m [93mLn[0m [93m3[0m+ [93mions[0m, but [93mcompound[0m [93m3[0m [93mshows[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mstructural[0m [93mtype[0m.
- [93mGd[0m([93m3[0m+)-[93mdoped[0m [93mcarbon[0m [93mdots[0m: [93mmodulation[0m of [93mmechanisms[0m [93mregulating[0m [93mgastrointestinal[0m [93mtract[0m [93mmotility[0m and the [93mhepatobiliary[0m [92msystem[0m.: [93mGadolinium[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93multra[0m-[93msmall[0m [93morganic[0m [93mparticles[0m are a [93mpromising[0m [93mmaterial[0m for [93mtheranostics[0m, [93mparticularly[0m as [93mcontrast[0m [93magents[0m for [93mMRI[0m. [93mHowever[0m, a [93mnumber[0m of [93munresolved[0m [93missues[0m [93mremain[0m [93mregarding[0m [93mtheir[0m [93mpotential[0m [93meffects[0m on [93morgans[0m and [93mtissues[0m, [93mespecially[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mpossible[0m [93mtoxic[0m [93meffects[0m of [93mgadolinium[0m [93mions[0m. The [93maim[0m of this [93mwork[0m was to [93mconduct[0m a [93mcomprehensive[0m [93mstudy[0m of the [93mfunctional[0m [93mstate[0m of the [93mdigestive[0m [92msystem[0m after an [93mintravenous[0m [93minjection[0m of a [93mcolloidal[0m [93msolution[0m of [93mgadolinium[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mcarbon[0m [93mdot[0m [93mnanohybrids[0m ([93mGDNHs[0m). The [93mstudy[0m was [93mperformed[0m on [93mWistar[0m [93mrats[0m. [93mSpontaneous[0m and [93magonist[0m-[93minduced[0m [93mcontractions[0m of the [93mcircular[0m [93msmooth[0m [93mmuscle[0m ([93mSM[0m) [93mpreparations[0m from the [93mgastric[0m [93mantrum[0m and the [93mcaecum[0m were [93mmeasured[0m in [93misometric[0m [93mmode[0m. [93mLipid[0m [93mfractions[0m and [93mfree[0m [93mamino[0m [93macids[0m in [93mblood[0m [93mplasma[0m were [93mdetermined[0m [93mchromatographically[0m. [93mMolecular[0m [93mdocking[0m of [93mGDNHs[0m to the [93mstructure[0m of the [93mmuscarinic[0m [93macetylcholine[0m [93mreceptor[0m was [93mperformed[0m [93musing[0m [93mblind[0m [93mrigid[0m [93mdocking[0m with [93mSmina[0m [93mosx[0m.[93m12[0m. It was [93mfound[0m that [93mintravenous[0m [93madministration[0m of [93mGDNHs[0m [93mgenerally[0m [93minduced[0m [91mchanges[0m in [93mspontaneous[0m [93mSM[0m [93mcontractile[0m [93mactivity[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mcontraction[0m [93mamplitude[0m and [93maltered[0m [93mfrequency[0m, [93mmodification[0m of [93mcontraction[0m-[93mrelaxation[0m [93mcycle[0m [93mdurations[0m and [93mvelocities[0m, and [93menhanced[0m [93mefficiency[0m [93mindices[0m. Under these [93mconditions[0m, [93mmechanisms[0m [93mregulating[0m and [93mmaintaining[0m [93mphysiologically[0m [93mrelevant[0m [93mdifferences[0m in the [93mmechanokinetic[0m [93mparameters[0m of [93mSM[0m [93mcontractions[0m [93macross[0m [93mdifferent[0m [93mdigestive[0m [93mtract[0m [93mregions[0m were [93malso[0m [93maltered[0m. [93mMoreover[0m, [93mGDNHs[0m [93mmodulated[0m the [93mmechanisms[0m of [93madrenergic[0m [93minhibition[0m and [93mcholinergic[0m [93mexcitation[0m in the [93mantrum[0m and [93mcaecum[0m . The [93meffects[0m of [93mGDNHs[0m on [93mcarbacholine[0m-[93minduced[0m [93mcontractions[0m of the [93mantrum[0m [93mSM[0m were [93mmainly[0m [93mattributed[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93morganic[0m [93mcomponents[0m, [93mwhereas[0m in the [93mcaecum[0m , [93mthey[0m were [93mpredominantly[0m [93mmediated[0m by [93mGd[0m [93m3[0m+ [93mions[0m [93mcomplexed[0m with [93mnanohybrids[0m. [93mMolecular[0m [93mdocking[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93mcharacteristic[0m [93mbinding[0m [93minteractions[0m at the [92minterfaces[0m between the [93mGDNHs[0m and the [93mmuscarinic[0m [93macetylcholine[0m [93mreceptor[0m in a [93mpotential[0m [93mcompetition[0m with [93macetylcholine[0m [93mmolecules[0m. In [93maddition[0m, [91mchanges[0m were [93mobserved[0m in the [93mconcentrations[0m of [93mmost[0m [93mlipid[0m [93mfractions[0m and [93mcertain[0m [93mfree[0m [93mamino[0m [93macids[0m in [93mrat[0m [93mblood[0m [93mplasma[0m. [93mOverall[0m, [93mintravenous[0m [93madministration[0m of [93mGDNHs[0m was [93maccompanied[0m by [93menhanced[0m [93mgastrointestinal[0m [93mSM[0m [93mmotility[0m ([93mdue[0m to the [93mactivation[0m of [93mcholinergic[0m [93mexcitation[0m) and [93mpartial[0m [93mmodulation[0m of [93mhepatic[0m [93mlipid[0m and [93mprotein[0m [93mmetabolism[0m. [93mHowever[0m, these [93meffects[0m [93mdid[0m not [33mlead[0m to [93mpronounced[0m [93mdysfunction[0m of the [93mdigestive[0m [92msystem[0m, [93mindicating[0m that [93mGDNHs[0m [93mcan[0m be [93mconsidered[0m a [93mpromising[0m [93mbasis[0m for the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93mMRI[0m [93mcontrast[0m [93magents[0m.
